General.Name: Yew Lee Pacific Group Berhad
General.Description: Yew Lee Pacific Group Berhad, an investment holding company, primarily engages in the manufacture of industrial and household brushes in Malaysia, Thailand, Vietnam, Indonesia, Taiwan, and internationally. The company trades in industrial hardware and machinery parts, as well as distributes industrial brushes; and after-sales services. Its products are sold to various end-user industries, such as rubber gloves manufacturers, glass and wood manufacturing, industrial manufacturing, agriculture, electrical and electronics contract manufacturers, food processing, and industrial/commercial cleaning and retail customers. Yew Lee Pacific Group Berhad was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Pusing, Malaysia.
